dmca.title: [ABUSE] Illegal Pictures being used
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, April 09, 2006 8:06 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; xxglamrgrlxx@aol.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal Pictures being used]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Illegal Pictures being used
Date:         Sun, 09 Apr 2006 18:54:38 -0400
From:         xxglamrgrlxx@aol.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



To whom it may concern,

The site www.Planetbrooke.com <http://www.Planetbrooke.com> hosted by you is
selling unauthorized pictures of me. They do not have a model release, which
is against federal law and also a requirement for hosting such pictures. We
are in the process of pursuing legal matters but I wanted to inform you so
you were not caught in any legal actions we take and also so that these
pictures will be taken down as soon as possible.
I spoke with one of your representatives, Mickey, and he assured me your
help on this matter. Thank you for your time.

Also, my photos are also located on other sites hosted by you,
www.asphericash.com <http://www.asphericash.com> and www.myplanetgirls.com
<http://www.myplanetgirls.com>. These sites are operated by the same
webmaster. I would appreciate their removal also.

Thank you,
Elizabeth Adcock
601-720-8139


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEOa+JvK/XpJs6oyURAv+tAJ40wsOcjr+1vw2aKsRYY6nWfG0OwACeP+xJ
h4XJCImd7yzfK6/Jm/R3THM=
=pORD
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
